topic.title: Navigate with Go To Dialog Box in Text Mode

keywords.indexterm: Editing XML Documents in Text Modedocument navigationfast navigation in Text mode

body.p: To navigate precisely to a part of the document you are editing in the Text mode, use the Go to dialog box. To open the Go to dialog box, go to Find Go to (Ctrl+L (Cmd+L on Mac)) .
Complete the dialog box as follows:

ul.li: Line - Destination line in the current document.
Column - Destination column in the current document.
Offset - Destination offset relative to the beginning of document.
